answers.answer: Hi there!Yes, these are possible benefits of lipoic acd; however these are yet to be proved substantially or beyond doubt; though a few studies do indicate its benefits in a number of disease processes.Hope this information is helpful.Take care!

question: i have read about Alpha Lipoic Acid  from  http://www.supplementvitamins.org/antioxidants/alpha-lipoic-acid that some they said can help about my acne and solve for skin problem and some said can help for side effect Diabetesi really wish to know it's truth or lie ?
title: truth or lie about Alpha Lipoic Acid
